name: PalliativeCareExclusionHDSNOMED
title: Palliative Care Exclusion HD SNOMED
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Palliative Care Exclusion.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute Palliative Care Exclusion for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath),(Data Element Scope: Palliative Care Exclusion care need for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: Palliative Care Exclusion SNOMED Codes that constitute the Diabetic Kidney care need for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
